title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 664.7 - Accounting for software
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 664.7 - Accounting for software

State Regulations

The original cost of initial operating system software
for computers shall be classified to the same account as the associated
hardware whether acquired separately or in conjunction with the associated
hardware. (See also account 8310, Software Expense.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
664.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
